content: But he runs incredibly fast, much faster than I do, and he's always the first to catch the prey.
info: NPC日常赠礼回礼-情感1-1013萨飞里_赠礼回礼

content: That means the <style=Highlight>{赠礼}</style> you gave me is the most perfect potted plant. Kula bata!

content: Thank you, <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>! Wearing these on my future trips will feel like having you right beside me. We'll share many journeys together.

content: {A点头}Now night patrol won't be a problem anymore. This is the perfect lookout spot!
